description.value:
Your freshly spilled blood is sanctified, and ingesting it causes effects similar to those of @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.efFe4EK7ThUrH446]{Holy Water}.

Whenever a fiend, undead, or creature with a weakness to good damage drinks your blood or deals piercing or slashing damage to you with jaws, fangs, or a similar attack, that creature takes [[/r 1d6 #good]] good damage.

You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to Crafting checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.rmwa3OyhTZ2i2AHl]{Craft} @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.efFe4EK7ThUrH446]{Holy Water} using your own blood as one of the ingredients.
